solution.title: How we do it
solution.subtitle: At Subliminal AI, our goal is to make a substantial positive impact on the bottom line of your business as soon as possible. To make sure this happens, we follow a structured, collaborative process for each project.

card_1.title: Data strategy and understanding
card_1.description: For new customers, it's important for us to wholly understand your company's data sources, identify what's useful, and provide clarity on cleaning up currently unusable data so it can be utilized in future analysis.
card_1.output: Output: Recommendations for high impact future projects.

card_2.title: Identify the highest value project and build a proof of concept
card_2.description: Every AI problem is difficult to get right the first time. We start by developing a baseline model to be improved over time. This ensures that the business idea is possible.
card_2.output: Output: A working proof of concept solution that can be evaluated and tested easily.

card_3.title: Move the proof of concept into production
card_3.description: With your working prototype and validated idea, we'll collect more data, iteratively improve the model, and deploy your model for immediate use by your business.
card_3.output: Output: A polished, high performing model, integrated into your existing business application or data platform.

services.title: What we do
services.subtitle: At Subliminal AI, our top focus is Natural Language Processing (NLP) where we are at the top of the field. we focus most of our projects  we have experience delivering many forms of intelligent systems. Here's what we can do for your company.

card_1.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
card_1.description: NLP is our speciality and where the majority of our work is centered. NLP is the process of creating structured knowledge from unstructured text.

card_2.title: Computer Vision
card_2.description: Does your company have a lot of images or videos? Turn that raw media into structured insights.

card_3.title: Data Analysis & Predictive Analytics
card_3.description: Whatever form your data is in, we can work with you to clean, augment, and analyze it to provide you with intelligent insights and predictive power.

card_4.title: End-to-end Software Development
card_4.description: Machine Learning is only useful if you can actually integrate it into your product. We understand the importance of software development practices and will work to integrate any models we create directly into your business applications.

bio.title: ABOUT THE AUTHOR
bio.description: Mark Brandao is an Inbound Marketer for Iconosquare, based in the Limoges office.She loves all things social and revels in keeping on top of the social media marketing game by writing for the blog.She’s also a bit obsessed with sushi and Netflix.
